Portal RPC and networking module.

PortalRPC is the layer used by rest of lustre code to achieve network communications: establish connections with corresponding export and import states, listen for a service, send and receive RPCs. More...

Modules

 net

Detailed Description

PortalRPC is the layer used by rest of lustre code to achieve network communications: establish connections with corresponding export and import states, listen for a service, send and receive RPCs.

PortalRPC also includes base recovery framework: packet resending and replaying, reconnections, pinger.

PortalRPC utilizes LNet as its transport layer.
